mapper.update: UPDATE msg SET is_delete = 1 WHERE msg_id = #{msgId} AND receiver = #{receiver}
UPDATE msg SET is_read = 1 WHERE msg_id = #{msgId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM ((SELECT msg.receiver AS sender, msg.receiver_role AS sender_role, msg.msg AS lastest_msg, msg.msg_type AS lastest_msg_type, msg.is_read AS lastest_msg_is_read, msg.send_date AS lastest_msg_date FROM ( SELECT * FROM msg WHERE msg.is_delete = 0 AND msg.sender = #{receiver} AND sender_role = #{role} ORDER BY receiver, send_date DESC ) msg GROUP BY msg.receiver) UNION (SELECT msg.sender, msg.sender_role, msg.msg AS lastest_msg, msg.msg_type AS lastest_msg_type, msg.is_read AS lastest_msg_is_read, msg.send_date AS lastest_msg_date FROM ( SELECT * FROM msg WHERE msg.is_delete = 0 AND msg.receiver = #{receiver} AND receiver_role = #{role} ORDER BY sender, send_date DESC ) msg GROUP BY msg.sender)) m ORDER BY m.sender, m.lastest_msg_date DESC) o GROUP BY o.sender
SELECT * FROM msg WHERE (receiver = #{receiver} AND sender = #{sender}) OR (receiver = #{sender} AND sender = #{receiver}) AND is_delete = 0 ORDER BY send_date DESC LIMIT #{pageNo}, #{pageNum}
